column4: how do i add deb http://flomertens.keo.in/ubuntu/ edgy main main-all to my sources list?
how do i add "deb http://flomertens.keo.in/ubuntu/ edgy main main-all" to my sources list?
gksu gedit /etc/apt/sources.lst and add the line at the bottom. make sure you press enter on the end of the line. you will need to run sudo apt-get update
